review: Interface is very slow and native apps are slow as well. Not what i was expecting

review: Works as described. i did have a problem with the hulu app but that is probably their problem!!

review: Much less expensive option to satellite or cable. Signing up for Amazon Prime has many advantages.

review: Really great. It's like having a smart tv without paying the price. I would highly recommend it to everyone. The learning curve is a bit tough, but once I figured out how to use it I is great.
author: cassandra roberts

review: Terrible.... It is so slow when it comes to streaming netflixs. It buffers all the time. I am shipping my back ASAP.
